snippet: Rick’s Cabaret, a club in Midtown, owes more than $10 million in back pay to dancers who performed there without being paid hourly wages, a judge ruled.
abstract: Federal Judge Paul A Engelmayer rules that Midtown Manhattan strip club Rick's Cabaret must pay at least $10.8 million in back pay to about 1,900 dancers who performed there without being paid hourly wages; amount owed to dancers could be much higher, depending on outcome of trial set for 2015.
lead_paragraph: Rick’s Cabaret, a club in Midtown, owes more than $10 million in back pay to dancers who performed there without being paid hourly wages, a judge ruled.

headline.main: Millions Due in Back Pay to Dancers at Manhattan Strip Club
headline.print_headline: Millions Due in Back Pay to Dancers in Strip Club
